Introduction

E:U is a South Korean rapper, dancer, and singer under Yuehua Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group EVERGLOW.

E:U first started her career in the entertainment industry as a model before making her debut as an idol.

She made her debut with EVERGLOW on March 18, 2019 with the release of their first digital single "Arrival of Everglow", and its title song "Bon Bon Chocolat".
